DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to test the hypothesis that Laser speckle contrast imaging allows for the measurement of cutaneous blood flow following various durations of tourniquet ischemia.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Laser Speckle to Study Post Occlusive Reactive Hyperhemia in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Ischemia and post occlusive reactive hyperemia in the skin is tested in healthy normal subjects for tourniquet ischemias of 1, 2 & 3 minutes at rest.
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Affiliation to the French health system Any disease or chronic treatment
